name: Jikkyou Powerful Pro Yakyuu Next
overview: The second in the "PowerPro" series for Wii, which is equipped with the expected player data at the start of the 2009 pennant. With the first Wi-Fi connection support in the series, you can enjoy baseball games and player exchanges with players from all over the country at any time. In addition, a maximum of 4 people can gather and play a 2vs2 cooperative battle. In the new mode "Hero" that trains players, power professionals in elementary school aim to become professional baseball players in a sugoroku format. Players can operate the Wii remote controller horizontally, nunchaku, classic controller, and GC controller. In addition, it also supports Rimopower, which allows you to pitch and hit by shaking the Wii remote controller. If you have the player data and cheering song data of the Wii version "Jikkyou Powerful Pro Baseball 15" or the DS software "Power Pro Kun Pocket 11", you can use it in this work.
